Now that TU pulls may or may not be bumpable, you may want to consider the $250/month cap on the gas spending earning the 4% and the 0.25% rewards on the first 10K/year in non-bonus categories. The grocery/fast food/restaurant bonus spending cap of $750/month may also be too low for many. Not a card to replace all others, but could be a marginally useful addition.
